name: bipi
all_locations: Jakarta, Jakarta, Indonesia; Bandung, West Java, Indonesia
long_description: Bipi helps Indonesian cornerstores make extra money by reselling kitchenware and homeware products to their neighborhood customers. Through our platform, resellers can offer popular e-commerce products to their customers without any additional working capital. We make reselling easy and rewarding, by offering tools and tips that help resellers manage customers orders and reach their maximum sales potential.
one_liner: Bringing internet commerce to Indonesiaâ€™s neighbourhood stores
